column4: I added this line to /etc/apt/sources.list: deb http://repo.jahshaka.org/ubuntu/dapper/binary-i386 ./ and if I want to install something this happens: Failed to fetch http://repo.jahshaka.org/ubuntu/dapper/binary-i386/binary-i386//jahshaka_2.0rc3_i386.deb  404 Not Found
Is there a way to correct this error?
did you do 'sudo apt-get update' first?
